title: Project to Create Science Content Using Translation Technology (K-12)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific terminology and computer literacy
context.additional_context: Strengthening competency to develop educational materials for multicultural audiences by acquiring science translation skills

learning_goals: Achieve over 85% accuracy in scientific document translation through Computer-Assisted Translation (CAT) tools
Develop bilingual (English-Korean) science lab manuals using Problem-Based Learning (PBL) methodology

Learners write peer feedback (≥3 reviewers) meeting ≥3 out of 4 KT translation quality criteria (accuracy, fluency, naturalness, consistency) and propose ≥2 improvement strategies based on peer feedback
Report over 90% learning efficiency in translation skills by combining online MOOC materials with offline workshops
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
